title: WebSocket Real-Time
prompt:
Implement real-time communication for [USE CASE]:

Requirements:
1. WebSocket server setup (Socket.io/ws)
2. Client connection with reconnection logic
3. Event system and broadcasting
4. Features: messaging, presence, typing indicators
5. Scalability (Redis adapter, load balancing)
6. Security (authentication, validation)
7. Performance (compression, heartbeat)
8. Error handling
9. Testing and monitoring

Provide complete server and client code.
example: Implement real-time chat with typing indicators
